body: $ZIM Have to close the gap from last week.
@Bluest $ZIM will report Q1 2023 earnings on May 17th. At that time
created_at: we'll learn if and when and how much for the Q1 dividend. The ex-div date tends to follow within a couple of weeks of the record date. The payment could then be in late June or early July. For NYSE ADR shares
column3: there can be a lag of up to a week as the payments clear the US banking system to brokers. For FY 2022 ZIM paid $34 per share
column4: which amounts to an almost 80% TTM average. There is no guarantee this will continue. Some analysts are very bearish but the company fundamentals are very strong and the business model is designed to smooth the volatility. That hasn't worked for share price but I believe the Q1 earnings report will much stronger than some of the analysts predict. Morningstar has the shares at 247% undervalued.
